hints.content:
When multiplying by $10$, we shift our numbers $1$ place value to the left.

Number | Ten Thousands | Thousands | Hundreds | Tens | Ones
:-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-:  | :-: 
$7{,}170$| |$\swarrow\maroonD{7}$ | $\swarrow\blueD{1}$ | $\swarrow\greenD{7}$ | $\swarrow\purpleD{0}$  
$7{,}170 \times 10$ | $?$ | $?$ |$?$ | $?$ | $?$

Number | Ten Thousands | Thousands | Hundreds | Tens | Ones
:-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-:  | :-: 
$7{,}170$| |$\swarrow\maroonD{7}$ | $\swarrow\blueD{1}$ | $\swarrow\greenD{7}$ | $\swarrow\purpleD{0}$  
$7{,}170 \times 10$ | $\maroonD{7}$ | $\blueD{1}$ |$\greenD{7}$ | $\purpleD{0}$ | $0$
